Visit to the Qatar National Museum
13  May,  2024
A visit was organized in an effort to familiarize the participants with vital and significant facilities in the country. 16 members (from both groups) from the Best Buddies Club at Um Hakim Girls' High School participated in the visit. During the visit, a guided tour was conducted through the various wings of the museum to acquaint the participants with important and influential milestones in the history of Qatar.
